item.title: About me
item.dc:creator: Miki
item.content:encoded:
instagram
email@email.com
+420 798 798 798
Through my lens, I endeavor to unearth the hidden poetry that resides within the serene landscapes of our planet. From the majestic grandeur of snow-capped mountains reaching skyward to the tranquil depths of emerald-hued forests, I seek to unveil the intricate details, vibrant colors, and raw, untouched wilderness that often elude the casual observer.
It's in these remote corners of the Earth where I find solace, where the whisper of the wind through leaves and the babbling of a crystal-clear stream harmonize with the symphony of birdsong and rustling leaves, creating a sense of timelessness.

Pictures from Shivansh Sharma Thank you!

item.title: Whispers of Waterfalls
item.dc:creator: Miki
item.content:encoded:
Whispers of Waterfalls

| Beneath towering waterfalls, I felt the power of nature's verses as the cascading waters spoke of ancient forces. My own words flowed like the falls, capturing the awe-inspiring beauty of these liquid poems. The waterfalls, with their thundering descent and shimmering mist, served as both muse and metaphor. I stood in their presence, entranced by their unyielding energy, and my verses became a tribute to the relentless flow of life and the eternal rhythm of nature.

item.title: Enchanted Forest
item.dc:creator: Miki
item.content:encoded:
Enchanted Forest

Amongst the giants of the enchanted forest, I discovered the art of quiet contemplation. My verses resonated with the wisdom of the trees, translating their silent conversations into a poetic ode to their enduring majesty. The forest, a realm of towering giants and dappled sunlight, offered me a sanctuary for introspection and introspection. I sat beneath the canopy of leaves, feeling the heartbeat of the forest, and my verses became a testament to the deep connection between humans and the natural world.

| Beneath towering waterfalls, I felt the power of nature's verses as the cascading waters spoke of ancient forces. My own words flowed like the falls, capturing the awe-inspiring beauty of these liquid poems. The waterfalls, with their thundering descent and shimmering mist, served as both muse and metaphor. I stood in their presence, entranced by their unyielding energy, and my verses became a tribute to the relentless flow of life and the eternal rhythm of nature.
item.excerpt:encoded: Where trees share secrets in silence.

item.title: Mystical Moorlands
item.dc:creator: Miki
item.content:encoded:
Mystical Moorlands

On the windswept moorlands, I embraced the solitude and solitude. My verses painted the vast, open landscape with words, capturing the ethereal beauty of heather-covered hills and the cries of distant curlews.
